_instructions.how_to_use: Define derived parameters for all equipment in the cement industry
_instructions.formula_syntax: Use actual Comparative_tag names directly in formulas with mathematical operators (+, -, *, /, **) and functions (sqrt, abs, log, exp, sin, cos, etc.)
_instructions.application: Specify which equipment application this derived parameter applies to (kiln, coal mill, raw mill, cement mill, crusher, cooler)
_instructions.enabled: Set to true to activate the derived parameter calculation
_instructions.safety: Formulas are evaluated safely using numpy/pandas - no arbitrary code execution
